thread.title: Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2017 – Sarang Lascar, Asst Store Keeper & Navik Posts

author: publisher12
title: Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2017 – Sarang Lascar, Asst Store Keeper & Navik Posts

organizations.name: navik post details indian coast guard

text: Click here for Navik Post Details Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2017 – Sarang Lascar, Asst Store Keeper Posts: Indian Coast Guard has announced a notification for the recruitment of Group C (Sarang Lascar, Assistant Store Keeper) vacancies on direct recruitment basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format within 30 days from the date of advt. Other details like age, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Indian Coast Guard Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 02 Name of the Post: 1. Sarang Lascar (Group C): 01 Post 2. Assistant Store Keeper (Group C): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18-30 years for Post 1, 18-27 years for Post 2. Age relaxation is applicable as per Govt. rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Matriculation or equivalent, certificate of competency as Sarang from a Government recognized institute or equivalent for Post 1, Matriculation or equivalent for Post 2. Selection Process: Shortlisted candidates will be called for written test, trade test. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications along with complete bio-data, relevant certificates with photographs, in an envelope must be super scribed as “Application for the Post of ——–” by ordinary post to the Commander, Headquarters, Coast Guard Region (North-West), Post box No. 09, Sector – 11, Gandhinagar, Gujarat – 382012 within 30 days from the date of advt. Important Dates: Date of Advt: 14-03-2017. Last Date for Submission of Applications: within 30 days from the date of advt. For more details like pay scale, place of work & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt - Indian Coast Guard Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Navik Posts: Indian Coast Guard has published notification for the recruitment of Navik (General Duty) 10+2 Entry- 02/2017 Batch vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 10-03-2017 to 22-03-2017 till 1700 hrs. Other details like age, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Indian Coast Guard Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Navik (General Duty) 10+2 Entry – 02/2017 Batch Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 18 – 22 years (i.e. candidates should be born between 01-08-1995 to 31-07-1999 (Both Dates Inclusive)). Relaxation of age will be applicable up to 05 years for SC/ ST and 03 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification : Candidates should have 10+2 passed with 50% marks aggregate in total and minimum 50% aggregate in Maths and Physics from an education board recognized by Central/ State Government. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on written examination will undergo Physical Fitness Test (PFT) and Initial Medical Examination (Preliminary). How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.Joinindiancoastguard.gov.in from 10-03-2017 to 22-03-2017 till 1700 hrs. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Log on through the website www.joinindiancoastguard.gov.in. 2. Click on Opportunity. 3. Read all the instructions & Select the post applied for- Navik General Duty & Click on “I Agree”. 4. Fill all the details & submit the form. 5. Now take a printout copy of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online 10-03-2017 Last Date to Apply Online 22-03-2017 till 1700 hrs Starting Date for Downloading the Admit Cards 02-04-2017 Last Date for Downloading the Admit Cards 11-04-2017 Date for Test April 2017 For more details like pay scale, experience, exam centers & other information click on the link given below…
